name: HeadbuttersHelmItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this helm successfully charges an enemy, that enemy must pass a Reflex saving throw (DC 27) or suffer a -2 penalty to AC and attack rolls for 3 rounds.

name: HellknightHelmetItem
description: This is a black spiked helmet, commonly worn by the hellknights.

name: HelmOfBattleAlertnessItem
description: A creature that attacks the wearer of this helmet with a melee weapon, an unarmed strike, or a natural weapon, takes 1d6 electric damage.

name: HelmOfDevotionItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this helm suffers from negative energy or fire damage, for the next 3 rounds they gain a +2 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls, and their attacks are treated as good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming DR.

name: HelmOfFearlessVanguardItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this helm receives healing, she also gains 5 temporary Hit Points for 1 round.

name: HelmOfStaticDischargeItem
description: This helm grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus to CMD and electricity resistance 30. Also, whenever the wearer of this helm becomes a target of a spell that deals electricity damage (even if such effect was prevented by spell or elemental resistance), his next attack deals additional 2d6 of electricity damage.

name: HelmetArmagItem
description: This helmet grants its wielder immunity to critical hits and a +4 bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.

name: HelmetDragonscaleBlackItem
description: This helmet grants its wearer acid resistance 5 and a +3 bonus to saving throws against paralysis and sleep

name: HelmetDragonscaleBlueItem

name: HelmetEvilItem
description: This helmet increases by 1 the DC of all Necromancy school spells cast by the wearer, and give a wearer a chance to frighten the target on a hit. (Will saving throw DC 15).

name: HelmetEvilTeethItem
description: This helmet increases by 2 the DC of all Necromancy school spells cast by the wearer. The wearer temporary becomes an undead creature, and is cured by negative energy, while being damaged by positive energy. Spells and abilities affect the wearer as an undead creature. Wearer's health is calculated based on Charisma, and the wearer acquires all the immunities inherent to an undead creature.

name: HelmetFullPlateEvilRedItem

This bleed doesn't stack with itself, but stacks with bleed effects from other sources.

name: KineticDiademGreaterItem
description: This diadem increases the damage dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by 3d6 points and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 3d6+3. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 6d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 6d6+6 damage.

name: MaskOfNothingItem
description: This cursed mask grants its wearer a +20 insight bonus on all saving throws as well as a 50% miss chance as in total concealment which isn't revealed by true seeing. It also grants a +3 insight bonus on all Knowledge, Lore, Use Magic Device, Perception and Trickery skill checks. This mask doesn't work against Areshkagal's followers and its wearer suffers a -6 penalty on all saves and AC while in Areshkagal's domain. Can only be equipped by the player character.

name: ObsidianMask
description: The wearer of this mask gets a +10 competence bonus on Intimidation and Mobility skill checks. In addition, whenever the wearer of this mask lands a killing blow, they gain temporary Hit Points equal to the killed enemy's Strength modifier for 5 rounds.

name: ParagonOfDefendersItem
description: This helm increases the wearer's AC by +2 and gives a +3 bonus to Persuasion checks made to intimidate. If one of the wearer's allies falls unconscious from damage, the wearer takes a –2 penalty on attack rolls and skill checks for as long as they are farther than 10 feet away from the fallen ally.

name: PerfectTiaraOfChannelingItem
description: This tiara grants its wearer a +8 enhancement bonus to all mental ability scores (Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma). In addition, If the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Positive Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to undead creatures or heals to living creatures by +2d6. And if the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Negative Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to living creatures or heals to undead creatures by +2d6.

enchant.name: Intelligence8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Intelligence (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Wisdom8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Wisdom (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Charisma8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: PhylachetryOfNegativeChanneling
description: If the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Negative Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to living creatures or heals to undead creatures by +2d6.

name: PhylachetryOfNegativeChannelingLesser
description: If the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Negative Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to living creatures or heals to undead creatures by +1d6.

name: PhylachetryOfPositiveChanneling
description: If the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Positive Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to undead creatures or heals to living creatures by +2d6.

name: PhylachetryOfPositiveChannelingLesser
description: If the wearer of this headband has the ability Channel Positive Energy, it increases the amount of damage this ability does to undead creatures or heals to living creatures by +1d6.

name: PortalStoneHeadband_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: PortalStonePlanarHeadbandItem
description: This headband grants the wearer +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma ability score. Three times per day you can try to dominate outsiders, this creature has to pass Will saving throw (DC 22) or will be under dominating effect till the end of the fight. You also get a +1 insight bonus to AC against outsider creatures.

enchant.name: Charisma2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: PortalStoneSpiderHeadbandItem
description: This headband grants the wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence. Each time they cast a spell on the enemy, it must pass a Reflex saving throw (DC 20) or be entangled in web for 1d4 rounds, trying to break free each round. This web also deals 1d6+3 bludgeoning damage each round. Effects don't stack.

enchant.name: Intelligence2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Intelligence (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: PortalStoneStanceHeadbandItem
description: This headband grants the wearer +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom. Whenever you summon any Elemental, it gains 50 additional Hit Points.

enchant.name: Wisdom2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Wisdom (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: ProfessorHatItem
description: Within the Professor's Hat is a subspace similar to bags of holding but only accessible to the wearer of the hat. Wearing it increases the party carrying capacity by 200 and contains all masterwork tools possible, providing the wearer with a +2 competence bonus on all skill checks.

name: RangerCapItem
description: If the wearer has the druid's wild shape class ability, this circlet grants them a +3 bonus to AC and a +3 bonus to attack rolls while in wild shape.

name: RedDragonHelmetItem
description: This helmet grants its wearer fire resistance 10. Additionally, three times per day, the wearer can breathe out a blast of fire, dealing 3d4 fire damage in a 15-feet cone. Successful Reflex saving throw (DC 15) halves the damage.

name: RedHatOfHandsomenessItem
description: The wearer of this hat becomes too handsome for her own benefit. The hat grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Charisma2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: RogueCapItem
description: This circlet grants its wearer a +10 competence bonus on all Stealth checks and the effect of the rogue's fast stealth class ability.

enchant.name: RogueCapEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillStealth (descriptor: Competence)

name: RuggedHelmetItem
description: This helmet grant the wearer a DR 3/melee, but the wearer suffers a -3 penalty to Perception skill checks.

name: ShapeshiftersHelmItem
description: This helm grants its wearer a +2 bonus to AC while in Wild Shape. It also grants 1 additional use of Wild Shape per day, if the wearer has this class ability.

name: StagHelmetItem
description: This helmet focuses wearer's attention on the weak points of enemies, giving +1 insight bonus to attack rolls against flat footed and flanked targets.

name: StewardsHelmetItem
display_name: The Steward of the Skein's defiled helmet
description: This headband grants its wearer a +1 circumstance bonus on attack and damage rolls (to a maximum of 6) for every corpse and undead in a 30 feet radius around the wearer.

name: StorytellerAreshkaMaskItem
description: This cursed mask grants its wearer a +20 insight bonus on all saving throws, DR 5/-, fast healing 2 and a +10 insight bonus on concentration checks. This mask doesn't work against Areshkagal's followers and its wearer suffers a -6 penalty on all saves and AC while in Areshkagal's domain.

name: StubbornHeadItem
description: This helmet grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, a +3 natural armor bonus to AC, and a +4 bonus to saving throws against death effects.

enchant.name: Dexterity4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Dexterity (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: SturdySnootItem
description: This headband grants its wearer a +12 competence bonus on Athletics and Mobility skill checks. If this headband is worn by an animal companion, it also grants a +3 dodge bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

name: TheFirstCrown
description: This crown grants its wearer the ability to summon two elven warrior spirits for 10 minutes twice per day.

name: TightHelmetItem
description: This helmet grants its wearer a +2 bonus on saving throws against sonic spells.

name: TripleFinHelmetItem
description: This helmet gives its wearer one additional Gore attack per round that deals 1d8 cold iron damage with a +2 enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: WardedHelmetItem
description: This helmet grants its wearer a constant effect of the death ward spell.

name: WarpaintedSkullItem
description: This helmet allows the wearer to enter a Rage as a barbarian, and summon two Barbarian spirits to help them in combat for 20 rounds once per day. The legacy of Duthica will not yield its power to the weak, and characters with less than 15 Strength cannot equip it.

name: WindMasterHelmetItem
description: This helmet grants the wearer a +4 bonus to Initiative.

name: ZeorisDaggerHeadband_BetrayalItem
description: This headband grants its wearer +6 enhancement bonuses to Charisma and Intelligence ability scores. In addition, all party members of the wearer gain a +3 insight bonus on saving throws against confusion, insanity and domination spells.

enchant.name: Charisma6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Intelligence6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Intelligence (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: ZeorisDaggerHeadband_GoverningItem
description: This headband grants its wearer +6 enhancement bonuses to Charisma and Wisdom ability scores. In addition, the wearer and all their allies in a 10 feet area gain the effects of the Shielded Caster, Allied Spellcaster and Shield Wall feats.

enchant.name: Charisma6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Wisdom6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Wisdom (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: ZeorisDaggerHeadband_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.
